H0.text: what kind of money should i take to costa rica. US Dollar

H1.text: what kind of money should i take to costa rica. Euro

H2.text: what kind of money should i take to costa rica. Mexican Peso

H3.text: what kind of money should i take to costa rica. Costa Rican colón

A4.text: The colón (plural: colones; sign: ₡; code: CRC) is the currency of Costa Rica.

A5.text: The currency was subject to a crawling peg against the United States dollar from 2006 to 2015, but has been floating within a band allowed by the Costa Rican central bank since then.
